category: Key Phrases - Use gender and number agreement
Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
word: Salut, Léo. Ça va bien. Aujourd'hui je vais au supermarché.
meaning: Hello, Léo. I am fine. Today I am going to the supermarket.

category: Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
word: Ah, le supermarché est ouvert aujourd'hui?
meaning: Ah, is the supermarket open today?

category: Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
word: Oui, les supermarchés sont ouverts aujourd'hui.
meaning: Yes, the supermarkets are open today.

category: Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
word: Tu prends le vélo pour y aller?
meaning: Are you taking the bike to go there?

category: Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
word: Non je prends le bus. J'ai un vélo vert mais il est chez moi.
meaning: No, I take the bus. I have a green bike but it is at my place.

category: Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
meaning: All right. Have a good day at the supermarket!

category: Radio: Supermarket Goodbye - Lucy is Listening
meaning: Thank you, Léo. See you soon.

category: Radio: Big Green House - Late Nights with Lin
word: Salut. Je m’appelle Omar. Aujourd’hui je vais au supermarché.
meaning: Hello. My name is Omar. Today I am going to the supermarket.

category: Radio: Big Green House - Late Nights with Lin
word: Le supermarché est grand. J'achète des plantes vertes dans le magasin.
meaning: The supermarket is big. I buy green plants in the store.

category: Radio: Big Green House - Late Nights with Lin
word: Les plantes pour ma maison. La maison est grande et verte.
meaning: The plants for my house. The house is big and green.

category: Radio: Modern Bicycle - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Louis. Mon vélo est petit et vert.
meaning: Hello, my name is Louis. My bike is small and green.

category: Radio: Modern Bicycle - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: J'aime beaucoup mon vélo. Aujourd'hui je vais au magasin avec mon vélo.
meaning: I like my bike a lot. Today I am going to the store with my bike.

category: Radio: Modern Bicycle - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
Radio: Modern Bicycle - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: Alors je vais au supermarché. Le supermarché est grand.
meaning: So I am going to the supermarket. The supermarket is big.
